welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bregenz, Austria! Get ready to fall in love with the city's charming atmosphere and its stunning location on the shores of Lake Constance. We invite you to explore and experience all that Bregenz has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Altenrhein Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hohenems-Dornbirn Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Hohenems-Dornbirn Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Friedrichshafen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free for the first hour, additional time can be purchased.
